About.paragraph: Suvidha Mahila Mandal, established on September 8, 1995, is a non-profit organization working to impart education among the financially challenged sections to help them realize parity in education and strength of little minds in building a promising future. The organization has provisions of student internships, student mentorship, and the scope to volunteer. Through these programs, the organization aims to achieve the vision of imparting innovative education that stays with the students forever and equips them for the unforeseen future.

Gallery.title: Food Donation Initiatives by Our NGO
Ensuring Happy and Healthy Animals through Feeding Programs

Services.name: Healthy Food
Services.text: By focusing on healthy food donations, our NGO aims to improve the well-being and quality of life for individuals and communities in need.

Services.name: Social Awareness
Services.text: We provide resources, conduct awareness campaigns, and facilitate access to hygiene facilities, aiming to create a healthier environment and prevent the spread of diseases.

Services.name: Tree Plantation
Services.text: Through community engagement and active participation, we successfully planted thousands of trees, fostering a greener and healthier ecosystem for future generations.

Services.name: Health Care
Services.text: We believe that access to healthcare is a fundamental right, and we work tirelessly to ensure that healthcare services are accessible, affordable, and of high quality for those in need.

Services.name: Primary Education
Services.text: By collaborating with local communities and educators, we aim to empower children with the knowledge and skills they need for a brighter future.

Services.name: Social Care
Services.text: Our programs encompass a range of support services, including counseling, vocational training, and advocacy, with the goal of empowering individuals
